message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200.  I believe it offers a great deal of value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down to $180, but that's the lowest I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
